thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Mickey

author: Mickey
title: Mickey
text:
Direct TV and HBO will not let me use my HDMI cable because my 3D Projection TV is not compliant with some stupid new anti people/customer BS. They tried to extort a 2 year contract extension or charge me Two Hundred Dollars to fix the problem that they created! B&H can fix the problem for less than forty bucks! Congratulations Direct TV and HBO you just joined Apple, Honda Motorcycles, AT&T and Facebook on my "Companies that are so big they can hate their customers" List!
Congrats to B&H for joining South West, Chic-Fil-A, and USAA on my Top 4 List of Companies that LOVE their Customers!!
